holidays.title: Labour Day
holidays.description: Workers in Australia were the first to achieve a reduction in working time without a salary cut!

holidays.title: National Child Health Day
holidays.description: Family income is a major factor in the health of children both physically and mentally.

holidays.title: National Consignment Day
holidays.description: For everyone that likes to be on-trend and still live green, this day is for you!

holidays.title: National Forgiveness & Happiness Day
holidays.description: Did you know forgiveness has numerous benefits for your physical and mental health?

holidays.title: ​National Frappe Day
holidays.description: Frappes are a favorite for all ages and all ranges of taste.

holidays.title: National Inner Beauty Day
holidays.description: Dig deep and show the world what makes you beautiful; shine your light!

holidays.title: National LED Light Day
holidays.description: LED lights are good for the world — and they make a space look super attractive.

holidays.title: World Architecture Day
holidays.description: Today, we appreciate the great architectural works of the ancient and modern worlds.

holidays.title: World Cotton Day
holidays.description: Join the celebration of cotton to raise awareness about its essential role in economic development.

holidays.title: You Matter To Me Day
holidays.description: You Matter To Me Day gives you a chance to bond with your loved ones.

holidays.description: Brittani Lancaster is a brilliant young woman who informs people about body positivity.
